attributes.action: Petition for the national front and EDL to be banned
attributes.additional_details:
Following the increase in what is obviously racial abuse by members of the English Defense League and National front members, I think its about time the government took action to get these organisations banned and make sure their members get brought to justice for their actions.

We all know that these people are racist but now they are even starting to attack british people just for having different views. This is a blatant breach of freedom of speech and must be stopped.
